name: Haunted futa mansion - DLC_1
description:
This is a DLC for this game: https://vaasko.itch.io/haunted-futa-mansion

The DLC contains only 1 level, so only 1 futa "monster"

Installation:

  • Windows: add the DLC_1 file in the same folder as the main game, link above
  • Android: the file contains the base game + DLC_1, so u don't need the base game here
